pkg.warningSize: show warning dot if image size is larger than this value (KB)
pkg.exclude: scan images not in exclude (pattern syntax of micromatch)
pkg.tinypngKey: tinypng key. If choose tinypng, you should set this key which can be get from https://tinypng.com/developers. If not set, it will use unstable key
